description:
Taller de escuela de verano RIIAA 2020 (WS-12)

Repositorio del taller: https://colab.research.google.com/github/psc-g/intro_to_rl/blob/master/Introduction_to_reinforcement_learning.ipynb

Algunos links de utilidad mencionados en el curso:
- Dopamine framework: https://github.com/google/dopamine 
- Sutton & Barto book : http://www.incompleteideas.net/book/the-book-2nd.html 
- Spinning up in Deep RL: https://spinningup.openai.com/en/latest/ 
- OpenAI: https://openai.com/ - Temporal Difference Learning and TD-Gammon : https://cling.csd.uwo.ca/cs346a/extra/tdgammon.pdf 
- Arcade Learning Environment: https://jair.org/index.php/jair/article/view/10819 
- Human-level control through deep reinforcement learning: https://www.nature.com/articles/nature14236 
- Wumpus World in introductory artificial intelligence : https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.5555/2038836.2038844 
- The Wumpus World in Artificial intelligence: https://www.javatpoint.com/the-wumpus-world-in-artificial-intelligence
title: Aprendizaje por refuerzo
